100020001.text: Hey, {NICKNAME}, it's Herta. I need you for something good

100020002.text: Come to my office quickly! I'm waiting!

100020004.text: But you're right next to me
100020004.option: But you're right next to me

100020006.text: [Automatic reply] Hi, I'm currently unavailable, and I won't be contacting you later

200150001.text: I need you for something. Reply when you read this

200150004.text: What is it? Is it about the Simulated Universe?

200150007.text: [Automatic reply] Hi, I'm currently unavailable, and I won't be contacting you later

200150010.text: [Automatic reply] Hi, I'm currently unavailable, and I won't be contacting you later

200150012.text: [Automatic reply] Hi, I'm currently unavailable, and I won't be contacting you later

200290001.text: What? Are you going to give me pocket money?
200290001.option: Are you going to give me pocket money?

200290009.text: Oh, I lost it. No wonder I can't find it

200290010.text: Losing a puppet... It seems like you are not that good at this
200290010.option: Seems like you are not that good at this

200290011.text: I'm just too lazy to do it myself

200290018.text: [This is a group message. Please do not reply.] Give me the number of current Curios

200290020.text: I told you not to reply

200290013.text: Did your puppet fall off the space station?

200290014.text: Where did you lose it? We can ask others to help

200300003.text: [Panopticon System Safety Alert] The system has detected unusual sign-in activity of the user. Be sure to protect your personal information and do not transfer money to them

200300004.text: [Panopticon System Safety Alert] The system has blocked the link for you. Please stay vigilant and verify the user's true identity before taking any action!

200300005.text: Are you really Herta? I don't believe you

200300006.text: Do I have to send you a selfie to prove that I am Herta?

200300011.text: Ugh, the system's interception is always triggered at the wrong time

200300012.text: Never mind. It's just some of your personal information anyway. I'll ask Himeko to fill it out for you

200300013.text: That kind of information shouldn't be filled out by others! Give me back my personal information!
200300013.option: Give me back my personal information!

200300017.text: What are you panicking about? I have no use for it

200300018.text: [Automatic reply] Hi, I'm currently unavailable, and I won't be contacting you later

200300015.text: What do you want my personal information for? That kind of information can't be shared with others, I think?

200300007.text: The link is blocked. I can't open it

200300008.text: Did you log into your account at a strange place?

121760004.text: We have a small update that can dissect and snapshot a section of time in the Simulated Universe

121760007.text: It means we can customize the system parameters more

121760008.text: Such as "doubling" the Planar Ornaments data that appear in each world

121760014.text: He pulled a bunch of weird analytics like daily active users, user retention rate, and average session length. I don't get it, but he says those are really important

121760015.text: Anyways, now you know. The feature will stick around only for a few days. Remember to come test

121760016.text: Can we keep this feature forever?
121760016.option: Can it be a regular feature?

121760017.text: Can we do triple drop rates? Ten-time rates???

121760012.text: What do you think this is? A video game?

121760006.text: Can you explain what you mean???

121780008.text: We have a small update that can dissect and snapshot a section of time in the Simulated Universe

121780015.text: It means we can customize the system parameters more

121780016.text: Such as "doubling" the Planar Ornaments data that appear in each world

121780022.text: He pulled a bunch of weird analytics like daily active users, user retention rate, and average session length. I don't get it, but he says those are really important

121780023.text: Anyways, now you know. The feature will stick around only for a few days. Remember to come test

121780024.text: Can we keep this feature forever?

121780025.text: Can we do triple drop rates? Ten-time rates???

121780026.text: If you give me ten-time drops

121780027.text: Then I'll leave a good review for the Simulated Universe

121780020.text: What do you think this is? A video game?

121780010.text: Can you explain what you mean???

121780011.text: This sounds so familiar. Did we talk about this before?

121780013.text: Stephen insists on having comparative data. He's working really diligently and says this is just how much effort you need to put in for a project

121780004.text: The same feature as last time?

121780005.text: Yep. Customizable parameters. Adjusting the Planar Ornaments dropped in each world to "double"

121780006.text: Stephen insists on having comparative data. He's working really diligently and says this is just how much effort you need to put in for a project

121860001.text: Ruan Mei's at the space station

121860008.text: I called her and Screwllum here to talk about some important matters.

121860009.text: Come back when you're free and introduce yourself to her. That way she knows who's the person that's been testing the Simulated Universe.

121860010.text: Remember to show Ruan Mei some respect. You don't usually get many chances to meet her.

mission.name: When the Stars of Ingenuity Shine

122110000.text: I've heard about what you did. Nice work.

122110004.text: What's there to worry about when I'm around?

122110007.text: It's a shame that we haven't found the Phase Flame yet.
122110007.option: It's a shame that we haven't found the Phase Flame yet.

122110009.text: I'll think of it as Ruan Mei owing me a favor.

122110012.text: Also, I'm thankful to Mr. Ratio.
122110012.option: Also, I'm thankful to Mr. Ratio.

122160000.text: These are Madam Ruan Mei's creations... Found one that looks like you

122160002.text: [Automatic reply] Hi, I'm currently unavailable, and I won't be contacting you later.

122160007.text: [Automatic reply] Hi, I'm currently unavailable, and I won't be contacting you later.

122160005.text: Even its personality is like yours!
122160005.option: Even its personality is like yours!

130240001.text: She keeps encouraging me to try the Simulated Universe out, yet she never tells me about her new book. Does she even see me as her friend? I'm so disappointed.
130240001.option: Why didn't you tell me about your new book?

130240006.text: For matters related to business-based collaborations, ask Asta.

130240007.text: That's not what I want to talk about!!!

130240011.text: Why don't you test the Simulated Universe?

130240012.text: When will the book be published?

130240013.text: Can you give me a date? I'd like to see more manuscripts.

130240017.text: Why is it stuck? Is your puppet having a weak signal?
130240017.option: Are you having a weak signal?

130240029.text: [Automatic reply] Hi, I'm currently unavailable, and I won't be contacting you later.

130240018.option: You're so good at brushing me off.

130240019.text: The least you can do is type your messages to me.

130240020.text: After spending some time in the Simulated Universe, I've gained some insights about the laws of the universe that I'd like to share with you.
130240020.option: (Make up a long story to get her signature)

130240022.text: When I went deeper into the Simulated Universe, I saw a black hole. What exactly am I discussing when I talk about a black hole? I guess it's a kind of mysticism, given it is one of the most mysterious phenomena in the universe. It has such a strong gravitational field that even the light is sucked into it. It's a masterpiece of general relativity, a being so colossal that it distorts space and time in an almost unimaginable way.

130240023.text: Will I see the core of Nihility after passing through the black hole? It gives me a sense of detachment as if it is the graveyard of space and time. We might be reluctant to admit it, but it undoubtedly exists. When we stand face to face with each other, there is a massive black hole between us.

130240024.text: I'm a Nameless from the Astral Express, and the way the Nihility is affecting me is unbearable. Now... I need a small favor from you.

130240025.text: May I have the collector edition of your new book with your autograph on the title page?

130240026.text: From where did you copy this?

130240027.text: I'm not going to read it. It's too long.

130240008.text: I just happened to stumble upon the ad, and I'm not here to talk about collaborating.
130240008.option: Just wanna talk. Don't need to bother her.

130240009.text: Let's not bother Asta as I just want a casual chat.

130240003.text: Oh, I mean, you look gorgeous in it.

130240004.text: I passed by the space station just now and saw your advertisement. It's great.

info.name: Herta
info.signature: This account is disabled | Business Contact: Asta
